Blog.post: in case u were wondering maggie just bit me in the head it hurt. according to the little kidz at my camp i am a mongoose eating squirrel.

Hi! guess wut? i'm a cit (councler in training) at a little kids camp! sounds fun? it sux i hav never had so many fuc*ing hairs pulled out of my fu*king head in one f*cking day (i'm sorry about the language im just a little pissed off right now, could ya tell?=) andyway i'm actally happy cuz Mariah's coming home today and i haven't seen her in forever so yay!!! if ur reading this mariah -hi! welcome bak- anyway like the new photos i added? p.s. if anyone needs help putting fotos on their blog post a comment and beleive me its really easy but its really hard to figure out ( i spent like 2 hours just trying to figure it out) anyhoo i hav to go but i luv u all and i'll talk to you later! p.s. maggie, i loved ur bible stories(j-dawg's the best)

hi it's maxine(duh) i was just chillin' (with the villans) at home and decided to go on my blog. Maggie if you're reading this i just wanted to tell you that.... cocaine's(however u spell it) a hell of a drug. yay! i said it, anyway tell more people to read my site cuz its cool and soon i'm going to post a lot more funny pics on it(and they WILL work this time!!) I'm bored and if you are too you can call me or e-mail me at pinkyflamingoe@yahoo.com (yes it's a weird e-mail but there weren't any good ones that weren't already taken) if u do we can have a deep and interesting conversation or we can just talk about random crap(that's always fun) peace out syonora ttfn ttyl adios aloha bye buh-bye good-bye oh nevermind

A horse is a horse, of course, of course, And no one can talk to a horse of course That is, of course, unless the horse is the famous Mister Ed. Go right to the source and ask the horse He’ll give you the answer that you’ll endorse. He’s always on a steady course. Talk to Mister Ed. People yakkity yak a streak and waste your time of day But Mr. Ed will never speak unless he has something to say A horse is a horse, of course, of course, And this one’ll talk ‘til his voice is hoarse. You never heard of a talking horse? Well listen to this: "I'm Mister Ed."

Why isnt anyone interested in my pie club?! I am so hurt! You idiots dont know what you're missing. I am going to go cry in a corner now and theres nothing you can do about it!!! (except join my pie club, hint hint)

Hi if you read my first post you probably realized that i have a pie club if you're interested in joining this club or attending one of these events read on..... The Pie Club was started by Earny Green in 1989. Since then he has sadly moved on to other things and gave the ownership to me. The Pie club meets every Sunday from 4-6 p.m. at wherehouse 50 on Peir 50 (it's near the baseball feild) We have many discussions and do other interesting things related to pie. If you would like to join it costs $7 and $3 for every month you are part of it. We also have special pie club events which are open to the public. These events are $5 for non-members and free for members. Here are some of the events and their dates. July 18th Pie History Day( a presentation will be made on the history of pie) July 25th-Pie Eating Contest August 20th-Pie themed birthday party for our special friend maggie August 27th-Learn how to make 5 different kinds of pies Note anyone planning to join or attend any of these events must contact me before hand -Maxine

Wow this blog thing is kinda cool, u can write stuff and people can read it. Sally why dont you allow comments on yours it makes me want to......(wait i'm thinking).......to........ Eat a bannana, Ha!!!! beat that non - comment allowing person!!!! whats that you say? thats not evil? well for your information i hate bannanas!!!! thats why I got my friend fred the monkey to sit on them. and now the world is happy except for me becuz I cant write comments on sally's posts! poooooooooooooopppppppppppp!!!!!!

See, I ate food today and it was quite good. sooooooo...... this is fun........I like pressing the button that putts dots on the screen...... I think I spelled my title wrong oh well, isn't this interesting? I went to Europe for those of u hoo didn't know!!!!!!Hey, its Ariana here to spuce things up because Maxine doesnt know what to say!!!!!!Well okay back to Maxine.... I hope that little commentary inspired you to spruce up boreing stuff.(oops spelled it wrong, oh well) If you like pies u can join my pie club its quite fun, we eat pies not that that has anything to do with pies or anything. okay ariana has somthing to say-Okay Maxine I say SCREW YOUR PIE CLUB!!!!!!!!!!but that wasnt very nice.....what is a pie club anyway. Before we can say that it is bad we need to understand it more deeply. Nuclear wars are started by the word "hate" so I suggest you never say that you HATE Maxine's pie club OR ELSE (there will be a nuclear war)!!!!- back to maxine- I hope you enjoyed arianas "speach" about maxine's non-existent pie club
